Frame.Text: Rain is pouring harshly on a shabby makeshift tent
Finn wakes up from a soft beeping noise coming from spark
Finn holds spark out, He's low on energy!
Where is he going to find energy for Spark? He has run out of funds
Frantically running under the rain trying to find somewhere that sells spark's liquid energy
Mega conglomerate that produces energy for robots of all kinds
Big billboard showing the advertisement of the liquid energy
Two security guards stop him because he looks too homeless
